channel.title: Unforeseen Consequences: all stuck posts collection
channel.description: Hey. I just got to the bit where the huge elevator takes you down a diagonal drop where all the head crabs jumped down at you from the top on HL1 and I can't get that elevator to move, there's no switch that works and no doors that open. Help me before I go insane! I cant go back because of the underwater bit just before...

item.title: Unforeseen Consequences: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Conti
item.description:
Thread moved!

Please check here.

Read full topic

item.title: Unforeseen Consequences: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
Madcat1030:

Yeah, there isn’t a flare gun, just flares. Keep your eyes open for red cylinders on tables and the ground up until you find the crowbar. Ninja’d.

There are some later on, too. There’s actually a scene in office complex where if you set a zombie on fire the sprinklers go off. Blew me away the first time I encountered it.

Read full topic
item.source: Unforeseen Consequences: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Unforeseen Consequences: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Roland
item.description:
MessMessa:

I don’t think I like the jump+crouch thing being so mandatory… And the jump height is minimal… Gee…

If you played the original HL1, you will find that it is par for the course. Crouch jumping is absolutely essential. I bind my crouch button to Mouse 4…makes it a lot easier for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Unforeseen Consequences: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Conti
item.description:
Sixx:

I jumped down onto it after I turned the power on but I die as soon as I touch the surface of the lift.

Definitively a glitch, then. Try to do what SilverlightPony suggested to see if it works.

item.description:
Sixx:

I jumped down onto it after I turned the power on but I die as soon as I touch the surface of the lift.

See:

SilverlightPony:

Glitch. Load an earlier save. It’s supposed to be at the top when you get there.

item.title: Unforeseen Consequences: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: warpedfreeman
item.description:
Sixx:

Wondering if any of you can help me with this:

Crawled through vents into control room, turned on the power:
https://i.imgur.com/Rf5KR.jpg

Go outside to the lift but it doesnt come up:

https://i.imgur.com/e10rA.jpg

Any idea what I should do?

you have to go down on it, push that button on the elevator while, you fight headcrabs

Read full topic

item.title: Unforeseen Consequences: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Conti
item.description:
The elevator was in that position originally? Because it seems to be a glitch. The elevator should be in that position when you reach the room, even before crawling in the vents:

1600×900 247 KB

After turning on the power, you just have to click on the elevator button to make it go down.

Read full topic

[align=center]

[/align]

[align=center]

1024×768 115 KB

item.source: Unforeseen Consequences: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Unforeseen Consequences: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Rabbiddog
item.description:
Jenova19:

Funny, the first time I played the game, said guard was acting brilliantly skilled and killed everything in sight.

The second time, however, he just wouldn’t shoot his darn pistol, which then led to him being choked to death by the zombie he was trying to “hug” for the past 10 seconds. :meh:

He still had ammo, btw (around 5-6 shots).

Sure, I could’ve just tried to find a flare, but it was just to funny watching him, as he tried to stare the zombies to death.

This same thing happened for me only I set the zombie on fire with a flare while they were ‘wrestling’ which was even more comical to watch.

Read full topic
item.source: Unforeseen Consequences: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Unforeseen Consequences: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Jenova19
item.description:
Madcat1030:

When the zombie gets right in the guard’s face, he won’t fire. You need to backpedal so the guard steps away.

That’s what I tried, he then somehow did backpedal, but still didn’t fire.

Then I ran in circles around the elevator exit - he tried to catch up, but changed direction and started to move back and forth.

When I stopped, he went back to his buddy, again (not firing a single shot).

Oh, and about that “he won’t fire” thing: How’s it that pretty much every single hostile NPC has a melee, but the guards do not?

…or do they have one?

Note: It’s nothing to worry about, I just thought it was kind of funny - how he stood there and watched…

As I said, I didn’t act because I thought it was interesting to watch (how the AI reacts in different situations, etc.).

Read full topic
item.source: Unforeseen Consequences: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Unforeseen Consequences: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: JackShaftoe16
item.description:
Stuck after the guy opens the security room. Where do I go after he stays put and I get the first handgun?

Edit: Nevermind, I found it. The formerly locked door in the big room where you see the 2nd level walkway to the security room.

PS. Having fun! Loved HL2, loving new content!

Read full topic

item.title: Unforeseen Consequences: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: SegaAges
item.description:
lucifer579:

There are various flares on the ground in the very first hallway where you meet the guard.

Well that makes everything easier.

I did not even know that those flares could even be used as weapons (I assumed it was a flare gun and that the flares I could pick up like other objects, but that was it). I had no idea they could be used as a weapon. That is pretty awesome.

Read full topic

item.title: Unforeseen Consequences: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
bulin:

No tips for me?

You’re going up the wrong opening. One of them the ladder is broken, that’s the one you go in, there’s another one where the ladder is there, just look around.

Read full topic
item.source: Unforeseen Consequences: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Unforeseen Consequences: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: lucifer579
item.description:
When you reach the main entrance (where you arrived at the beginning with the tram) you have a big room. In this room you should be able to find a ventilation shaft that you can pass through. Right inside this shaft you will be able to spot something.

bulin:

No tips for me?

If you flooded the canals you should be able to find 2 holes.
1 the one you entered from.
2. One with a ladder to climb up on.

Have you searched the canals enough?

Read full topic
item.source: Unforeseen Consequences: all stuck posts collection

bulin:

No tips for me?

If they do not reply by the time I get home, I will see if I can figure it out. I pretty much need to replay a chunk anyway, so I will see if I get to that water part and if I figure it out, I will post up here.

Read full topic
